articles.title: Experts tell White House coronavirus can spread through talking or even just breathing - CNN
articles.description: A prestigious scientific panel told the White House Wednesday night that research shows coronavirus can be spread not just by sneezes or coughs, but also just by talking, or possibly even just breathing.
